name: Crafty Bear by orazio
description:
Greetings to everyone.

I submit my game in basic MSX2 which will participate in the pure120 category. 
It was set up with OPEN-MSX and BLUE-MSX emulator. But I recommend trying it with OPEN-MSX because it is much more accurate.
I tested it with Philips NMS8255 machine. The name of the game is "CRAFTY BEAR". 
Small explanation of the game.
Behind 5 trees hides a crafty bear who wants to make fun of you. It will appear on either side of the tree for a few moments. 
You will have to hit him with a dagger. In addition to the score at the top of the screen, on the right hand side there will be a 'BEARS'  hit counter. The latter will count the bears affected every ten appearances. And it will start over when you pass the level. 
In the beginning you will have 5 chances to fail, and every time you pass the level, you will have to make one less mistake,  until you can no longer fail. 
It is played with the 2 cursor keys; left and right and the space bar to throw the dagger.
Good fun.
